mapper.select: select a.*, (select count(f_like_id) from f_likes b where b.festival_id_fk=a.festival_id) f_like from festivals a where a.festival_id = #{value}
select count(review_id) from reviews where festival_id_fk=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into festivals(festival_id, festival_contents,festival_name, festival_host, festival_place, festival_addr,festival_latitude,festival_longitude, festival_homepage, festival_end, festival_start, festival_image) values(#{festival_id},#{festival_contents},#{festival_name}, #{festival_host},#{festival_place, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{festival_addr}, #{festival_latitude, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{festival_longitude, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{festival_homepage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{festival_end, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{festival_start},#{festival_image})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.*, nvl(b.likes, 0) likes from festivals a left join (select festival_id_fk, count(f_like_id) likes from f_likes group by festival_id_fk) b on a.festival_id = b.festival_id_fk order by likes desc) where rn > #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select count(festival_id) from festivals WHERE FESTIVAL_NAME like '%'||#{value}||'%' or festival_contents like '%'||#{value}||'%'

select * from (select rownum rn, a.*, nvl(b.likes, 0) likes from festivals a left join (select festival_id_fk, count(f_like_id) likes from f_likes group by festival_id_fk) b on a.festival_id = b.festival_id_fk where (a.FESTIVAL_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or a.festival_contents like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by likes desc) where rn > #{start} and rn <= #{end}

select c.* from(select rownum rn, b.* from (select a.* from festivals a where (a.FESTIVAL_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or a.festival_contents like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by a.festival_start desc) b)c where rn > #{start} and rn <= #{end}
